sen.j: 新丸太町通（しんまるたまちどおり）は京都市左京区の南北の通りの一つ。
sen.e: Shinmarutamachi-dori Street is one of the north and west street in Sakyo-Ward, Kyoto City.
Shinmarutamachi-dori Street is a street running north-south through Sakyo-Ward, Kyoto City.
Shinmarutamachi-dori Street is a street running north-south through Sakyo Ward, Kyoto City.

sen.j: 鴨川 (淀川水系)の東、仁王門通から孫橋通まで、途中交差する通りのない延長300m足らずの道路である。
sen.e: This street extends for less than 300m with no crossing street from Niomon-dori Street at east of Kamo River (Yodo River series) to Magohashi-dori Street.
This street extends for less than 300m with no intersections from Niomon-dori Street and east of Kamo River (Yodo River series) to Magohashi-dori Street.
This street extends for less than 300m with no intersections from Niomon-dori Street and east of the Kamo-gawa River (Yodo-gawa River series) to Magohashi-dori Street.
sen.cmt: Kamo-gawa River, Yodo-gawa Riverとしました。"Kamo-gawa River"→"the Kamo-gawa River"に変更しました。

sen.j: 御所拡張のため、丸太町通の沿道住民が移住してきたためこの名があるという。
sen.e: The name came from that the residents of Marutamachi-dori Street had to move there for extension of Imperial Palace.
The name stems from the fact that residents of Marutamachi-dori Street were moved here after the Imperial Palace was expanded.
The name stems from the fact that residents of Marutamachi-dori Street were moved here after the Imperial Palace was expanded.

sen.cmt: 頭文字を大文字に変更
